column2: SELECT id, fname, lname FROM studenter ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, name, YHP, beskrivning FROM kurser ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM studenter WHERE username='{0}' AND password='{1}'
SELECT * FROM l√§rare WHERE username='{0}' AND password='{1}'

SELECT s.id, s.fname, s.lname, k.YHP, k.name, k.beskrivning FROM studenter s INNER JOIN student_courses n ON s.id = n.student_id INNER JOIN kurser k ON k.id = n.kurser_id WHERE s.username='{0}' AND s.password='{1}'
